title: Audit Corporate Credit Card Usage
description: An auditor analyzes corporate credit card data to identify potential policy violations or fraudulent use.

tasks.description: Obtain the transaction data for all corporate credit cards for the last 6 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor has the complete dataset.

tasks.description: Analyze the data to identify high-risk transactions, such as cash advances, weekend purchases, or payments to suspicious merchants.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis flags several cash advances, which are explicitly forbidden by policy.

tasks.description: Investigate the flagged transactions by reviewing the submitted expense reports and contacting the cardholders.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor confirms the policy violations and recommends disciplinary action and improved monitoring controls.
